member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.Infrastructure.Storage.Interfaces.VersionInfo.TryCompare(System.String,System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: This method is used to compare two instances of string and returns an integer that indicates whether the first instance is earlier than, the same as, or later than the second instance. For comparison, the specified strings representation of a date and time are converted to their DateTime equivalent using the format "yyyy-MMdd-HHmm-ssfff", which is the format used for storing the time stamp as a string version label.
